name: Adjustments of assessing practices
text: Upon the adoption of district boundaries, certified copies of the classification maps showing the district boundaries shall be filed with the department of taxation.  Thereafter, the department of taxation shall, when making assessments of property within a district, give consideration to the use or uses that may be made thereof as well as the uses to which it is then devoted. [L 1963, c 205, pt of §2; Supp, §98H-14; HRS ]
